subtitle: 25‑delta skew — difference between 25Δ call and put IVs.

measures.typical_ranges: Small absolute values; watch for regime shifts.
measures.caveats: Delta estimates and sampling windows affect values.
measures.what_it_measures: Iv Skew 25D derived from market data.

assistant_hints: Negative skew (equities) implies pricier puts — downside demand.
Use within-ticker comparisons; cross-asset skew differs structurally.
Treat as context for strategy selection (e.g., risk reversals).
Delta method and data sampling matter; be consistent.
beginner_summary: 25‑delta skew — difference between 25Δ call and put IVs.
